subject: Re: [junit] I would like to fix JUnit bugs.What should I do?
msgSnippet: I have not found any bugs but I have noticed that there are a list of problems reported by many junit users and also feature requests(like inclusion of new
messageBody:
I have not found any bugs but I have noticed that there are a list of
problems reported by many junit users and also feature requests(like
inclusion of new methods) in sourceforge.net.
Some problems have been accepted as bugs and fixed by Mr. Erich Gamma while
other problems(probably they are not problems) have not been "assigned to"
anybody.
So I thought there was a procedure for getting bugs assigned.
----- Original Message -----
From: "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 20, 2003 7:30 AM
Subject: Re: [junit] I would like to fix JUnit bugs.What should I do?


> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
> > So said Narendra S on 2003-08-14 --------------------
> >
> > >I have worked on JUnit and Java for quite sometime and I feel I could
fix
> > >some JUnit bugs found in Sourceforge.net.
> > >What is the procedure for getting bugs "Assigned to" me?
> > >I can submit a patch only if the bug is assigned to me. Is that right?
> >
> > I don't know about submitting code; it doesn't seem to happen often.
> >
> > Can you describe the bugs you have found?
>
> I notice that there was no response to this.
> --
